typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ActorName as string,
		PhysicalAvailabilityDate as timestamp,
		Genre as string,
		Rating as string,
		TheatricalReleaseYear as short,
		RuntimeMinutes as short,
		StreamingAvailabilityDate as timestamp,
		Title as string,
		SourceSystemMovieID as string,
		SouthridgeMovieID as string,
		SourceSystemID as string,
		GlobalMovieID as string,
		ActorID as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> CatalogCuratedOutput
CatalogCuratedOutput select(mapColumn(
		ActorName,
		SourceSystemID,
		ActorID,
		Gender
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectActorAttributes
